Counter-Strike is a competitive computer game in the first-person shooter genre. It is considered an eSports discipline.

Game mechanics:
Two teams of 5 people face each other for 30 rounds, each of which lasts almost two minutes.
One team plays for the "attack" side, the other for the "defense"side. After 15 rounds, the sides change.
The team that wins the round of 16 wins the game.
Its a good game if u have prime and good trustfactor
